front.title: Evaluation of SRTP Keying with SIP

abstract.t: Over a dozen incompatible mechanisms have been defined to key an Secure RTP (SRTP) media stream. This document evaluates the keying mechanisms, concentrating on their interaction with SIP features and their security properties. This document is discussed on the rtpsec mailing list, <http://www.imc.org/ietf-rtpsec>.
